name: The Princess Trap (Ludum Dare #37)
description:
A princess imprisoned in a room.. or is she? Use your traps cleverly to expel the suitors/knights.

---------

Only use right and left arrows to move and space for the rest. Each lever activates a different trap (which needs to reload). Once the night has come and all the knights are expelled, you can either upgrade one of your traps or repair your door.

If the knights break your door, the game is over.

The game has no end, you just have to resist as long as possible.

---------

It was made for Ludum Dare 37 (theme "one room") in roughly 2 days: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=66030

---------
